description.en: Create AI podcasts or Video Storybook from any content. Upload files, paste youtube links or input any topic to generate natural conversations with human-like voice quality. Free AI voice clone.
description.zh: ListenHub 是专业的免费AI播客生成工具，支持中文语音合成。上传文件、输入话题即可生成超真实人声播客。支持PDF、TXT等多种格式，让知识获取更轻松高效。
